Description:
Promoter duties and responsibilitiesProvide all the needed information on promoted products and services
Job will be done on floor in our retailers shops.
Promote and sale our product.
Assist customers in finding the suitable product they are looking for
Provide information and guidance on product you are selling.
Build lasting relationships with customers by contacting them to follow up on purchases, suggest purchase options and invite them to upcoming events
Consistently seek new product knowledge to act as an expert for the customer
Present products using interactive materials such as videos, charts, slideshows etc.
Set up booths or promotional stands and stock products if needed.
Arrange merchandise display to look tidy and attractive to customers
Disseminate product samples, brochures, flyers etc.
Engage with customer and discover their wants and needs
Submit daily sales report through the company sales appSkills

Female
Can speak both English and Arabic
Previous working experience as a Promoter for (x) year(s)
BS in Marketing or equivalent
Proven track record of successful promotions
Customer oriented approach
Excellent communication, presentation and leadership skills
Outstanding organizational and time management skills
